channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Dinner Table Conversation: Why eating earlier may help you during winter
Dying for attention: How being a famous singer could shorten your lifespan
This Week in Explainers: Why the death rumours around Imran Khan are thriving
History Today: When OpenAI launched ChatGPT, revolutionising the way we see AI
Australia PM Anthony Albanese marries long-time partner. Who is Jodie Haydon?
Cyclone Ditwah: How Tamil Nadu is gearing up to face storm after it killed over 120 in Sri Lanka
How Pakistan’s ‘strategic depth’ on terrorism turned into a ‘strategic trap’
item.description: Provinces once celebrated as Pakistan’s ‘strategic depth’ — Khyber Pakhtunkhwa and Balochistan — are now insurgency belts where the state loses soldiers faster than it can rotate reinforcements

item.title: India’s quiet strategy for turbulent times: Bide the time, build the strength
item.description: For the idea of Atmanirbhar Bharat to help make India a superpower, India has to manufacture things that are big and small, on its own steam, with original thinking

item.title: Illegal and outrageous detention of Indian passenger in Shanghai shows India’s strategy of ‘managing’ China is not working
item.description: Beijing’s audacious play and calculated slight of an Indian citizen were aimed at challenging the sovereignty of India and sending multiple messages

item.title: How Pakistan’s nuclear-terror nexus enters its most dangerous phase under Munir’s dictatorship
item.description: The world can no longer treat Pakistan’s internal affairs as domestic. The country has entered a perilous era where a single man wields constitutional, military, and nuclear authority, yet he is unbounded by any accountability, law, or restraint

item.title: Thanesar: In Kurukshetra’s shadow, a tale of ruins, history and faith
item.description: If someone happens to visit Kurukshetra for the Gita Mahotsav, he must drop in to the archaeological complex at Thanesar to relive its history

item.title: The grim message behind deadly shootout at Washington
item.description: A shooting just blocks from the White House—one of the most secure locations on the planet—reinforces a grim message: there is no place in the world free from terrorism
